Title: Igor
Writer: Chris McKenna, Tony Leondis (additional screenplay material), John Hoffman (additional screenplay material), Dimitri Toscas (additional screenplay material)
Actors: John Cusack, Myleene Klass, Robin Howard, Matt McKenna
Plot: In a world filled with Mad Scientists and Evil Inventions, one talented evil scientist's hunch-backed lab assistant has big dreams of becoming a Mad Scientist himself and winning the annual Evil Science Fair.
